title: University of flying
creator_credit: Central Office of Information and Maxwell Munden
brief_description: Men of all nationalities attend the Empire Test Pilot School at Cranfield, UK, for it is the only school of its kind in the world. Its purpose is to make men who are already experienced pilots into test pilots, for aircraft companies and Government establishments are always in need of test pilots.
